name: Two Words (ZapJackson)
description:
A narrative roguelike made for the No Image jam.  Lots of secrets.

Use number keys to select options. 

Loosely based on my submission to the 2015 200-word RPG contest. (https://200wordrpg.github.io/2015/rpg/finalist/2015/04/01/TwoWords.html)

Music is a heavily screwed-up version of Allegro, by Emmit Fenn (https://emmitfenn.com/)

Typeface is Metro Medium, licensed for noncommercial use from the H. P. Lovecraft Historical Society.  (https://www.hplhs.org/)
